data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pes, Ana M., Desidério, Gleison R., Barcelos-Silva, Patrik, Hamada, Neusa (2019): A new species of Macrostemum Kolenati, 1859 from Brazilian Amazon and the immature stages of M. brasiliense (Fischer, 1970) (Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 534: 1-20, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.534|11 occurrences
